item.title: Flop: Sales Acceleration
item.description: The sales acceleration project has been a real flop. BIGF Method My biggest effort was on the BIGF Method and it did not really pay much: one extra paying customer and only 26 free customers. I reached out to my contacts, got a post about my ideation method published in Spain, run ads on Quora and Googleâ€¦ There are a few factors to consider for this flop: The original landing page that I contracted via Fiverr did not work at all.

item.title: Why are there so many free Android and iPhone mobile apps?
item.description: Because it is much easier to make an app than to sell an app.
